author: rhuijben
msg: Turn the following warnings in errors in Visual Studio:
C4700 - Use of an uninitialized local variable.
C4789 - Buffer overrun when specific C run-time (CRT) functions are used.
Note that potentially unitialized variables trigger a different warning.
